entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [JsonConstructor] should not be required on readonly structs with a single parameterized constructor #59309
  • CAI, OCSP and CDP as System.Uri #59305
  • error is given to load p7b in X509Certificate2Collection #59304
  • [API Proposal]: Method to obtain an "empty" JsonDocument #59303
  • Linux/Arm: BBJ_ALWAYS block remains unvisited during dominance computation #59298
    6.0.0
  • Test failure System.ServiceProcess.Tests.ServiceBaseTests.PropagateExceptionFromOnStart #59297
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/providervalidation/providervalidation/providervalidation.sh #59296
    7.0.0
  • Implement `ToString()` on `System.Collections.DictionaryEntry` #59292

Closed

  • Different number decimal separators for the culture fr-CH in different environments #58650
  • WebSocket and multiple reads and writes #58202
    7.0.0
  • Browser WebSocket Improvements #44614
    Future
  • [wasm] ReleaseJSOwnedObjectByGCHandle - Value cannot be null #58031
    7.0.0
  • Unoptimal codegen for Vector<T> init if Vector is not a localVar. #33617
    Future
  • SIGSEGV during rejit process on Ubuntu 18.04 #56663
    7.0.0
  • EventPipeEventDispatcher throttling. #57554
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove redundant checks #59310
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1370789 #59308
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1370748 #59307
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Print "callsites by likely classes" chart in 'dotnet-pgo dump' command #59306
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1370394 #59302
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1370286 #59301
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix an occasional small perf issue in `ThreadLocal` constructor/dispose #59300
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • JIT: allow suppressing some dumps or parts of dumps #59299
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] x64 on ARM64 fixes #59295
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1370052 #59294
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] Check if External Object Context is still active after a possible GC #59293
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [Release/6.0] Add uploading of intermediate package assets #59291
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/6.0-rc2] Update source-gen APIs according to review #59243
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] WebSocket improve send/receive buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Cleanup defines in DirectoryServices.AccountManager #59265
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Make GCMemoryInfoData blittable #58738
    area-System.Memory
  • JIT: update debug dumping for loop hoisting #59287
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use AVX2 in codegen for GT_STORE_BLK #55604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix a minor assert issue in long decomposition #57326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix x86 linux tests #57244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Check if External Object Context is still active after a possible GC #59285
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Arm: Use correct form of store instruction when data is float #59187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59238
    area-codeflow
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • Fix invalid parsing of not unicode Uri #59252
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • JIT: Return multiple likely classes in getLikelyClass (for better GDV) #58984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prevent racing on installer shared props/targets #59276
  • [release/6.0] Align preallocationSize behavior #59078
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Fix building GC on Android #58703
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Loader/Binder area #59288
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add managed implementation of Math.ILogB and MathF.ILogB #56236
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Optimize Vector128/256.Equals via TestZ #55875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add initial regex source generator #59186
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
